roleset.name: connected, associated, wrapped up in

roles.note: Arg0-agent could be added to match the verb frame if it comes up.It isn't expected, however.

example.name: both args
example.text: A man who-1 [*-1] while having a relationship with you is involved in sex chats online with others .
example.arg: while having a relationship with you
in sex chats online with others

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, involve-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls involve-107, relate-86.2-1, require-103.
